originalText.text: I gave them a star because you must give them something. However this is the worst law firm ever. I wouldn‚Äôt recommended them what so ever( pay attention to the signs from the beginning)I am very disgusted with their communication and the way they operate in this office. I have worked with my attorney for over 20years and he was able to provide me with great referrals if the case wasn‚Äôt his expertise.   unfortunately he passed young. I have been trying to build a new relationship with a law firm after 2 weeks of calling, leaving voicemails (Just to get a response if my case will be taken )however no one has heard my case whatsoever and on today‚Äôs date young lady(office manager)tells me to simply find a new law office because she can‚Äôt force the attorney to call and their are thousand of them I can call ü§¶üèΩ‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è If I was told that from the start I wouldn‚Äôt continue calling that‚Äôs one. I thought I was being patient by waiting on them to respond to my voicemails and instead it backfired. Are they really busy üôÑI really hope you guys are not keeping them busy because people like this are not genuine people and have 0 customer service skills.(it goes a long way) I was wondering why they kept  changing  people and there‚Äôs no new reviews ü§î (reviews are mainly about Kristina, she is no longer there) It‚Äôs absolutely clear now  they are not improving. They are  probably over there finishing up their pending cases. When I was given their contact information by my attorney it was in 2014.  Yes I do keep my contacts because you never know when you need it but moving forward they will be deleted,after many years of keeping them on my phone üòÇ.  I just wish my attorney was still here so I can tell him this LAW FIRM SUCKED üëé I never really like writing reviews However I‚Äôm starting to understand The logic in them and when people are wrong and only when they are wrong and it effected in me in some way, I actually look forward to saving someone else from going through the same experience Plus like they said they are plenty of attorney office out there!!!so they won‚Äôt be missing out on nothing right? ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÄÔ∏è I say take your chances look elsewhere‚Ä¶. if I find the perfect one I might just come back and point ya in a  better direction.

originalText.text:
Our experience with Belluck and Fox has been informative, calming and professional.  Joe Belluck came into our lives at the most difficult time and made us feel at ease with his knowledge and compassion.  All aspects of the process have been handled at an urgent pace, working around and through all medical appointments and situations.  We highly recommend Belluck and Fox, a team that truly works with and for you.

Mary Briggs-Beha

text.text:
Our experience with Belluck and Fox has been informative, calming and professional.  Joe Belluck came into our lives at the most difficult time and made us feel at ease with his knowledge and compassion.  All aspects of the process have been handled at an urgent pace, working around and through all medical appointments and situations.  We highly recommend Belluck and Fox, a team that truly works with and for you.

Mary Briggs-Beha

originalText.text: Richard White and the staff at Belluck and Fox were caring, compassionate and respectful to both my father and my family during a very difficult time.  They explained everything to my father who was elderly in an easy to comprehend and professional manner and in particular, Richard was exceptionally patient with Dad.  Both Richard and the organization were quick to respond to questions, thorough in their investigations and preparation, and I would highly, highly, recommend this firm for any questions related to Mesothelioma, or for that matter anything.  They took us through the whole process efficiently, effectively and painlessly and made the transition after my dad's passing seamless.  I have nothing but thanks and praise for this firm and in particular Richard White.

Both Richard and the organization were quick to respond to questions, thorough in their investigations and preparation, and I would highly, highly, recommend this firm for any questions related to Mesothelioma, or for that matter anything.  They took us through the whole process efficiently, effectively and painlessly and made the transition after my dad's passing seamless.  I have nothing but thanks and praise for this firm and in particular Richard White.

originalText.text: Kristina Georgiou is WONDERFUL! She is all I would ever want in an attorney. She responds to emails rapidly with complete and clear information. She is working diligently on my case and keeps me up to date with her progress. She is professional, respectful and compassionate. Kristina has been supportive and encouraging and I am so grateful that she is working on my behalf. I recommend Kristina wholeheartedly, without reservation.

originalText.text: Our family has had the pleasure of working with Joe Belluck, and his wonderful staff, for the 1 1/2 years.  Although this has been a very difficult time for all of us, Joe and his team did everything possible to make our interactions as comfortable as possible.  We will always be grateful to Belluck & Fox for the outstanding work they did on behalf of our family in memory of my incredible husband.
